title: My google pixel 4xl suddenly is unable to open certain apps, they just crash immediately. Help!
content: Have tried restarting multiple times, safe mode and regularly. Seems that I updated apps on google play and then suddenly most apps won't even open now. Can't even use the Google search bar without it crashing. Have deleted some apps I wasn't using, thinking it was a memory issue but I'm only at about 60% full.
